summary: This document contains a summary of account balances and transactions for a Deutsche Bank account, detailing significant deposits and withdrawals during December 2013. It highlights a large incoming transfer from Black Family Partners, LP, and several outgoing transfers to various accounts, indicating financial activity that may be relevant to the Epstein case.

persons.name: Amanda Kirby
persons.context: Amanda Kirby is mentioned as a contact for personal assistance regarding the account.

events.title: Account Balance Summary
events.description: The document provides a summary of account balances as of December 1, 2013, and details transactions throughout December.

events.title: Incoming Transfer
events.description: An incoming transfer of $10,000,000.00 from Black Family Partners, LP is recorded.

events.title: Outgoing Transfer
events.description: An outgoing transfer of $250,000.00 to First Bank Puerto Rico is noted.

events.title: Outgoing Transfer
events.description: Another outgoing transfer of $200,000.00 to First Bank Puerto Rico is recorded.

locations: 6100 Red Hook Quarter, St Thomas 00802, United States
keyFacts: The document details account balances and transactions for a Deutsche Bank account.
Amanda Kirby is listed as a contact for account assistance.
A significant incoming transfer of $10,000,000.00 from Black Family Partners, LP is noted.
Multiple outgoing transfers to First Bank Puerto Rico totaling $450,000.00 are recorded.
The account had a beginning balance of $526,714,393.28 as of December 1, 2013.
